intro: Randia suishaensis, commonly known as the Shisha randia, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers and oval-shaped leaves. It thrives in tropical and subtropical climates, often growing in moist, shaded environments. Due to its unique appearance and limited distribution, it is of interest to botanists and horticulturists.
